para: Remove any existing etconfig.cfg files (don't worry, these files are automatically written by &et:name:abbr; everytime a game ends and just keep a copy of the last known settings for certain CVARs).
screen: &bash.prompt.et; cd ~etserver/server1/ &bash.prompt.et; rm etmain/etconfig.cfg &bash.prompt.et; rm jaymod/etconfig.cfg &bash.prompt.et; rm .etwolf/etmain/etconfig.cfg &bash.prompt.et; rm .etwolf/jaymod/etconfig.cfg
